channel.title: CVE Feed for mrt3vn -- Abandoned Cart Recovery for WooCommerce
channel.description: The latest CVEs for mrt3vn -- Abandoned Cart Recovery for WooCommerce

item.title: CVE-2021-4395|2024-08-03T17:23:10.746Z -- mrt3vn -- abandoned%20cart%20recovery%20for%20woocommerce
item.description: The Abandoned Cart Recovery for WooCommerce plugin for WordPress is vulnerable to Cross-Site Request Forgery in versions up to, and including, 1.0.4. This is due to missing or incorrect nonce validation on the get_items() and extra_tablenav() functions. This makes it possible for unauthenticated attackers to perform read-only actions via a forged request granted they can trick a site administrator into performing an action such as clicking on a link.
